Interface associated with an or for managing one or more instances associated with it. This helps an application manage longer-running operations in conjunction with the Activity or Fragment lifecycle; the most common use of this is with a , however applications are free to write their own loaders for loading other types of data.
While the LoaderManager API was introduced in , a version of the API at is also available for use on older platforms through . See the blog post for more details.
For more information about using loaders, read the Loaders developer guide.
